comment: Best way to keep up with purchases you make and the security is #1 download it if you don't have it !

author: Manan Sukhani
comment: Hey it's a good app. Well I am seriously in need of some money! Can someone just give me 10$. Please give money on paypal.me/MananSukhani

author: nilesh kambli
comment: Waiting for the sweet buddy to send me 10$ to -  paypal/NKambli

author: nfx
comment: can someone send me $20 please PayPal.me/fohnz

author: A Google User
comment: Can no longer link fingerprint on note 4 paypal app crashes

author: Rajesh Ramdati
comment: Nice app good for receive payments

author: slimefart doge
comment: Good

author: Mark Albritton
comment: PayPal granted me $1,000 credit line a while back. They were easy to pay back as well as easy to use. However, this is being written at a point in time when I cannot access my own account no matter how many times I try. The phone number on the account will not update no matter how many times I tried to verify with pictures of me, me and my driver's license, and other forms of verification. It has become incredibly difficult to access this account. I'd like to keep using it, however I'm looking into other options being that I cannot access my account.

Everytime someone sends me money and I try to automatically send it to my linked bank they hold my money. Every transaction they do this to me but they never give my sender any problems sending me the money. I honestly don't understand why it keeps happening to me but after my money is deposited into my account I will no longer be using PayPal. That is a major inconvenience for me. I now I have to wait 24hrs-72hrs to see if my transaction is approved to send to my bank smh. I don't understand why I can't just have my money.

Been using app for a few years with no issue. 2 weeks ago, I could not send money...app would just freeze (spin around after entering a contact and amount). Have sent multiple emails with no response or resolution...can log in and send via PC with no issue

author: Sammie Sanchez
comment: I've only encountered a problem 1 other time in the 10+ years I've been using PayPal. I can choose who I'm sending funds to, I can choose an amount and whether I want g&s or f&f but then....nothing. I can't send funds at all. I can receive funds, which is great as I receive more than I send, but I can't refund or send money back if overpayment occurs. I'm not always able to get to my laptop which is why I use the app and I've talked with several people locally that are having the same issue. Please fix this as it is a huge inconvenience.

author: Nita Hong
comment: I am trying to verify my account from overseas via "Upload Proof of Identity" because I can't receive texts for the code and the app is being weird. When I hit the "Choose a File" button on the next page, it doesn't do anything. I've done this several times and it's annoying. The option is there, but it doesn't even work.

What the hell ? I made a money request and saying enter the name of the person that i want to request for money. And i put his name. My big problem is. Is he is the only one who had that name? How can i know if the person i requested is my friend ? I cant see any details they just want a name or either an email add. There are millions of people had the same name. Pls. Fix it and email me

author: Mika Michelle
comment: Thanks for ruining the app. A once functional and smooth running app- in store purchases, pay online, etc I can no longer use PayPal in stores. Had to leave all my things at the store. I even uninstalled and reinstalled. Last update messed up the app

author: Ashley Reinhardt
comment: We've always been able to use this app to pay someone using PayPal. Recently that feature has stopped working on mine and my husband's phones so we are only able to send money from a computer. What's the point of having the app if you have to wait until you are near a computer to use your PayPal.

author: Ryan Samarakoon
comment: Not a bad app, PayPal in general is great especially with international money which I handle greatly. Very seemless. Only complaint is how America supports android pay while Australia still doesn't after much anticipation. This plays a major role in how I use and integrate PayPal with my finances.

author: AM Gaming
comment: Processing of funds transfer takes entirely too much time. You all take your money with no issues. There so long wait. So why do I have to wait for my own money. Smh. If my bank clears it, it should be automatically deposited... 7 days to receive my money... RIDICULOUS!!

author: Josh Saucedo
comment: App sucks. Never works. When it does not all features are usable. For instance I have only ever been able to make 1 transfer to my bank. It never works, always says not available at this time. Get on the computer and it's done instantly.

author: Troy Turner
comment: Horrible app as it will not allow me to log into my PayPal account on my phone. Says my phone is not registered in my name. Well perhaps it may be the fact I use Project Fi as my cell provider, I don't know. But can't use PayPal on phone it is no good to me.

author: Joshua Mack
comment: I mostly only use the app to check activity, but seriously, their 2FA needs to get to 2018 standards. The only supported option is SMS? Awful.  Even if you do go through the trouble of registering a TOTP method by some clever Googling, the app doesn't support it and, in fact, tells you that it is an *old* method and that you need to switch to SMS. I would really expect more from a company that I'm supposed to trust with my payment information in 2018.

author: Jenn Young
comment: Used to love this app. Used it for my small business making custom vehicle decals along with wedding and bridal shower decorations. Twice now my account has been limited for "sexually oriented content" and things that could be considered "obscene". I didn't realize kate spade or tiffany's themed bridal shower items or "it's a boy" or "its a girl" baby shower items fall under that category. Let alone sports decals with kids names on them. This time my account has been permanently limited and there's no phone number to talk to the individuals I need to speak with. Those you can talk to by phone can't do anything for you. I've emailed those who I'd need to speak to about this and they don't reply to any of the emails. Once you're account is limited you can't get any money from your account for a minimum of 180 days. If you're looking to run a small business with PayPal I strongly suggest against it. Go with a company that doesn't randomly accuse people of things.

author: Jamil Ahmed
comment: Forced to restart app to withdraw new money to bank account. Have to manually key in value to withdraw (would be useful to have autofill button). These barriers shouldn't exist. Unintuitive: opening app after transferring money will take you back to the transfer money screen.

author: Isaac Puff
comment: In today's world PayPal services are just too slow. It's taking almost two and a half weeks to get a refund issued. Customer service barely speaks English. Do yourself a favor and use other apps with faster service.

author: JM
comment: Loved the app. But since the last update I've been unable to send money from my phone. All other features, including receiving money, moving money to bank account etc continue to work. Reached out to PayPal via the "contact PayPal" in "Help" settings, currently awaiting a response. - Pixel 2 XL

author: Al F
comment: I do not recommend if you need to pay for something right away. Takes a week for money to show up in your account. It is pointless if you need to send or buy something right away.

author: Toni Ortega
comment: Adding saldo no problem, put all the money in the world, withdrawing money back into your bank account: money gone, have to wait 14 days before any investigation from PayPal, and I can't use that money, which is mine... Ridiculous

author: Korey Krog
comment: From what I see on reviews I don't even want to download this app anymore. Looks to me like it was once a good app but they have ruined it with in app purchases and pop ups. You'd think with such a big program paypal is they would fix the problems and make it better.

author: Natasha Tonsfeldt
comment: App is worthless. Hangs up when I try to send money or pay an invoice. Have to go through my browser anyway. Don't waste your time downloading this app

author: David Nickerson
comment: Have been using PayPal for years on my phone and Galaxy S2. Now, I can NOT use it on my tablet because it tells me to update the app. When I try clicking on the update link. It goes to the play store and that says the app is not compatible with my device. Running Android 7.0 on both devices but only works on my phone. Can't find out what's wrong from customer service and can't use the app. WHAT THE HELL IS UP WITH THIS????

author: Keith
comment: Whatever happened on the new update? I can't send money.... Just gives the thinking screen infinitely. Used to love this app and now hate it.... Annoying update ruined everything.

author: nathan walkham
comment: When did they change the transfer times? Took "up to 2 hours" last week now back to 2-3 days like it used to be years ago! Why fix what isn't broken...

author: Clint Franklin
comment: My previous view of this app was that it was brilliant...Now after the update a few days ago it's less than useful. I thought I would find a fix and came here to find it and I was wrong, so many people having problems with paypal now. Bring Elon back😁.

author: Aman jain
comment: I am not able to verify my email address it always shows they are having some trouble for completong my request. please fix it fast it's very frustrating because i have to transfer some money from my account but i am not able because of it

author: Signus X1
comment: Updated: called PayPal yesterday and reported the issue. I encourage everyone that updated this app to the latest broken version to call them as that may be the only way to get them on it asap. Here is what I wrote originally... "update broke the send to family and friends on galaxy s5 with android 6.0.1. Way to go PayPal!"   Get on it PayPal!!!

author: Sean Piercy
comment: App is completely screwed up on Galaxy Tab S2 since a recent update. I couldn't update it (said 'this version is not compatible with your device') although it was already installed and working fine. I was also receiving a pop-up telling me that I needed to upgrade, but when I tapped on the upgrade button it just took me to the Play Store where I received the same message. I'm also unable to leave comments for the app through my tablet (getting an 'error retrieving information from the server' error). Something in a new release really screwed the app up and until it's completely resolved, I will be leaving my rating at 1 star. I rely on it when I use my tablet and it's completely useless right now.

author: i called danny
comment: Absolutly discusting.   Paypal you need to sort your selfs out.  On hole for for hours and still never got to speak to anyone.  My money been pending for over a week.  Help page on web site is fake.  Im trying to call right now monday mornng and still no anser for an hr.   Does anyone even anser the phone.  It is Absolutly terrible holding peaples money.  Its like a scam. Give me my money and anser questions.  AND ANSER PHONE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

author: Jacob Krulcik
comment: It takes 10 BUSINESS DAYS for payments to process from one account to another. Are you F***ING kidding me? This slow processing is beyond unnecessary. I can't wait to back a better competitor.

author: Lioness138 W
comment: Have been with Paypal since 2010 & had no problems with the service experience until the most recent update, which ruined the app. I can no longer log in with my fingerprint, activity notifications are no longer received, and the app is now painfully slow. Uninstall then reinstall did not help.

author: Heather Smith
comment: I actually do like this app but I'm annoyed that it does not give me the option to choose friends and family when I'm requesting money. Every time I do I have to pay am $8 fee. Have updated and uninstalled and still doesn't work. Would rate five stars otherwise.

author: 민윤기김남준
comment: It's a bit misleading. I wanted to pay stuff w/ Paypal at Macy's and they said they weren't accepting it.   3-stars
